Thanks for your reply. Yes, I am quite familiar  with the process of seppuk=
u. I have been researching seppuku for the  past 3-4 years for this project=
, specifically its social and political  significance during the Tokugawa P=
eriod. My argument is that the  significance of seppuku changed during the =
Tokugawa due to several  factors... The greatest of of these being the abse=
nce of widespread  warfare to the extent in which it occured during the Sen=
goku Jidai. 
  
  I just wanted to see if anyone had a strong opinion about=
 the changes  in the philosophy of seppuku since the time of its inception.=
 
  
  Jonathan
